Primary detection methods: DPUK derived variable from Phase V (2002-2004) data
Identification of dementia: Assessment at clinic by a combination of interviewers and clinicians.
Has your doctor ever told you that you had any of the following: Dementia (Alzheimer's, Vascular Dementia, Lewy Body or other)? YES/NO

Primary detection methods: Electronic health records, via the Hospital Episodes Statistics database
